Works great thanks. for those having trouble installing. You get two files with this download. the application file(.exe) and the .txt file (instructions file)  You don not need to turn off your internet connection. Click on the application file and you get a box. Click on the top large box to install the program. After installing the program make sure it is close, ckick on the crack and a folder will be created containing two files. The crack file and read me. Now copy the crack file to the folder where your software is intalled suck as c:\program\magic\movie_edit etc...Then run as administrator (Right click on the file and select run as administrator a new box will come up with two skull like icons click on any of them and you will see the result of your crack on a small black box on the right side corner of the new box will say OK! Follow instructions on how to enter serial number and activation number. The software will ask you to enter the MPEG plugin only when it needs it to read video that you have opened the choose offline and enter then number provided. Simple. Ps! Anti virus will detect the crack as trojan or so but ignore it.
Thanks for your very useful creation... Pls. understand them, for not following your simple instruction. keep sharing APPs...

Here are the step by step instructions to Crack the Program

1. Click the application
2. You will have a window pop up called Slickinator. Click the button that says Magix Movie Edit Pro Plus 17 DLV Setup 
3. Follow install steps and click finish
4. Back on Slickinator window, Click on crack at bottom of the window, a new window opens with the crack.
5. Copy the crack icon and paste into the main program file where u just installed Magix. (C:\Program Files (x86)\MAGIX\Movie_Edit_Pro_17_Plus_Download_Version)
6. Double Click the copied crack that you just pasted and a window will pop up with two skulls on it.
7. Click on the left skull and you will see the little square box will now say (OK)
8. Start Magix Movie Edit Pro Plus
9. Enter Serial # 84701-67890-94618-67890-43251-19203
10. Enter Fake Email Address (r@r.com)
11. Now you will have 3 options. Activate online, phone, or email.
12. Activate by email and you will have a code to input. Enter 84701-67890-94618-67890-43251-19203
13. Enjoy

14. If You Can't Get it to work now, You shouldn't be messing with torrents! It works crack is easy, Just follow the steps.

1.) WRITE the instructions in such a way that they can be understood.
2.) Create the stupid little "Install" apps so that they make some sort of sense. EX: Click on this skull, told by someone who never made the app.
3.) Learn a little about transitive/intransitive verbs.
4.) Use a spell checker.
5.) Stop smoking dope.

Regarding the program itself, in my opinion, its one of the best and most powerful video editors I have ever used, but like the torrent, its not for beginners. If youre looking for a 5 minute solution to posting your video to Youtube, Magix is not the right choice. If, however, you are looking for a program that will produce nearly professional results without a university degree in video editing, Magix may be for you.  Any fairly computer literate person should be able to use Magix to make top quality (nearly professional) videos with some time and effort invested. Thanks for reading my opinion, cheers.

Many thanks!

**HOW TO INSTALL THIS PROGRAM W/ CRACK**
[WORKS 100% IF YOU FOLLOW EVERY STEP CORRECTLY]

[1.] Run the setup (MME Pro Plus17 DLV)
[2.] A Slickinator window will pop up. Click the huge button that says "Magix Movie Edit Pro Plus 17 DLV Setup".
[3.] Follow installation steps until finished.
[4.]   Go back on the Slickinator window and click "Crack" at the bottom-centre of the window / A new window will pop up displaying two files: One with a "key" icon named magix.movie etc.. [This is the crack] and the other, a text file.
[5.] Put the crack application (with key icon) into the program's directory ie. (C:\Program Files (x86)\MAGIX\Movie_Edit_Pro_17_Plus_Download_Version).
[6.] Now, double click on the crack and a small window will come up with two silver skulls on either side. Click the left skull and an 'OK' should appear on the bottom left of the window. Close it.
[7.] Start Magix Movie Editor Pro
[8.] Enter serial 84701-67890-94618-67890-43251-19203 
[9.] Enter a fake email address.
[10.] Three options will come up for activation via Online, Phone or Email.
[11.] Click activate by email and enter the serial key for the activation code.

(Note: If you do not see the email option, click
the writing on the left hand side saying something about Fax etc. [I don't remember]
And it should show the rest of the options.

If the installation is going to be so difficult, at least make the instructions worth reading. These instructions did absolutely fucking nothing for me.

guys it works, not the first time i tried it, but it eventually did.

right click the file that you placed in the magix program files folder and press 'run as administrator'. 

at this point my kaspersky internet security asked me to set its permissions. make sure you set it to not block it anytime.

run the program, enter the serial provided and it should let you enter an email. from then on, follow the previous instructions and you'll be fine.
i guess you just have to experiment a bit and read all previous comments
to use the MP4 serial you must start the program from the desktop as administrator..simple..
